document_data.name: Preeta Kreepa
document_data.mainbody: '''Preeta Kreepa''' was a twisted [[wizard]] in [[Undermountain]] in the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Preeta lived in hiding in a stone hovel inside the [[hobgoblin]] settlement in the [[Sargauth Level]] ruled by [[Azrok]]. She was busy raising [[drow]] corpses using the ''[[animate dead]]'' spell in order to create an army for Azrok.
document_data.History:
Once Preeta was a wizard assistant of [[Arcturia]], who nevertheless performed horrible experiments upon her. So she escaped and settled inside the hobgoblin settlement in the Sargauth Level; the fearful hobgoblins left her alone.

In [[1492 DR]],{{Waterdeep-time}} however, the menace of the drow of [[House Auvryndar]] forced Azrok to ask Preeta for help and she agreed.
document_data.Powers: Preeta had a mouth twice as large as normal size full of sharp teeth, and two [[beholder]] eyestalks sprouting from her eye sockets. The eyestalks emitted a fear ray and a paralyzing ray.
document_data.Possessions: She wore the skin of a [[kuo-toa]] as a cloak.
